revision.text: {{merged-from|Belarusian Ministry of Defense|January 5, 2011}} {{WikiProject Belarus|class=C|importance=low}} {{WPMILHIST|class=Start|Russian-task-force=yes|National=yes|Post-Cold-War=yes|European=yes |B-Class-1=yes |B-Class-2=no |B-Class-3=yes |B-Class-4=yes |B-Class-5=yes}} ==Untitled== 120th mechanized brigade in Machulishchi. ==Territorial Defence Forces== ::No. However all the English references - Main 2003 from the CSRC, see the ref at the page - have used the term 'territorial defence forces.' [[User:Buckshot06|Buckshot06]] ([[User talk:Buckshot06|talk]]) 11:42, 27 April 2008 (UTC) :::Its on the same site http://mod.mil.by/statyter.html but it doesn't say much. The term used is [[Territorial Defence Forces]]. They are formed primarily from economic considerations, and as I understand are voluntary, and based on the existing rayon administration because the missions are mostly logistic, civil defence and communications security. The first unit formed was apparently a cossack one! I'm loging off for tonight, cheers --[[User:mrg3105|mrg3105]] ([[User talk:mrg3105|comms]]) ♠♥♦♣ 12:53, 27 April 2008 (UTC) ::::For example the Vitebsk rayon is - район территориальной обороны №4 (Витебский район) http://www.gorod.vitebsk.by/youth/polojenie.htm as detailed in the city ordnance ПОЛОЖЕНИЕ об отделе по делам молодежи и оборонно-мобилизационной работе Витебского городского исполнительного комитета which looks after the "concerns of youths and defence-mobilisation work"! Seems like civil defence to me.--[[User:mrg3105|mrg3105]] ([[User talk:mrg3105|comms]]) ♠♥♦♣ 13:15, 27 April 2008 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified 6 external links on [[Armed Forces of Belarus]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=789735714 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20130927162702/http://www.radabnr.org/en/bibliographyen.htm to http://www.radabnr.org/en/bibliographyen.htm *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20080306045432/http://www.defac.ac.uk/colleges/csrc/document-listings/cee/g126 to http://www.defac.ac.uk/colleges/csrc/document-listings/cee/g126 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20120417044140/http://www.ryadovoy.ru/forum/index.php/topic%2C406.0.html to http://www.ryadovoy.ru/forum/index.php/topic%2C406.0.html *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20080513075011/http://www8.brinkster.com/vad777/sng/belorussia/belorusia.htm to http://www8.brinkster.com/vad777/sng/belorussia%5Cbelorusia.htm *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20120513220720/http://www.ryadovoy.ru/forum/index.php?topic=2514.0 to http://www.ryadovoy.ru/forum/index.php?topic=2514.0 *Added {{tlx|dead link}} tag to http://vsr.mil.by/2014/02/22/vooruzhennye-sily-respubliki-belarus-nasovremennom- *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20151123201004/http://mod.mil.by/ to http://www.mod.mil.by/ When you have finished reviewing my changes, you may follow the instructions on the template below to fix any issues with the URLs. {{sourcecheck|checked=false|needhelp=}} Cheers.—[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 07:01, 9 July 2017 (UTC)
